long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Copilot: Transform Your YouTube Viewing with AI

Discover Smarter Viewing: YouTube Copilot enhances your YouTube experience using AI. This innovative Chrome extension intelligently analyzes and summarizes video content while identifying and skipping interruptions like promotional content, intros, and outros. It saves you time and enhances your viewing.


Key Features:

Detailed Video Summarization & Search: Get concise and comprehensive summaries of videos and search content effortlessly.
Video Summarization: Get concise and comprehensive summaries to quickly and efficiently understand video content
Content Search: Search for specific content within videos using an AI assistant that can answer questions about the video and manage playback functions.
Chapter Segmentation: View videos in detailed segments for easier navigation.
Sponsor-Free Experience: Automatically skip sponsored segments for uninterrupted viewing.
Intros and Outros Skipping: Automatically skip repetitive intros and outros.
Privacy-First: YouTube Copilot operates without collecting or sharing your personal data.


Why YouTube Copilot?

Enhanced Productivity: Spend less time on interruptions and more on valuable content.
User-Friendly: Easy to install and seamlessly integrates into your YouTube interface.
Privacy-Conscious: We value your privacy. YouTube Copilot operates without collecting or sharing your personal data.
Constantly Improving: Regular updates ensure the extension stays effective against new types of promotional content. Your feedback helps our AI learn and improve over time.
Join the Community of Efficient Viewers

Install YouTube Copilot now and transform your YouTube experience. Say goodbye to interruptions and hello to smarter, more efficient viewing!
